sourcesContent:
import { ProductState } from './store';
import { Action, POST_PRODUCT_REQUEST, POST_PRODUCT_SUCCESS, POST_PRODUCT_FAILURE } from './action';

const initalState: ProductState = {
  status: "init",
  "prodID": 0,
  prodName: "",
  description: "",
  price: 0,
  figURL: "",
  date: "",
  calory: 0,
  protein: 0,
  lipid: 0,
  carbonhydrates: 0,
  sugar: 0,
  fiber: 0,
  scequiv: 0,
  region: [],
  allergy: [],
  lastUpdated: Date.now()
}

const postProductReducer = (state: ProductState = initalState, action: Action): ProductState => {
  switch (action.type) {
    case POST_PRODUCT_REQUEST:
      return ({
        status: "Fetching",
        "prodID": 0,
        prodName: "",
        description: "",
        price: 0,
        figURL: "",
        date: "",
        calory: 0,
        protein: 0,
        lipid: 0,
        carbonhydrates: 0,
        sugar: 0,
        fiber: 0,
        scequiv: 0,
        region: [],
        allergy: [],
        lastUpdated: Date.now()
      })
    case POST_PRODUCT_SUCCESS:
      return ({
        status: "Success",
        prodID: action.payload[0].prodID,
        prodName: action.payload[0].prodName,
        description: action.payload[0].description,
        price: action.payload[0].price,
        figURL: action.payload[0].figURL,
        date: action.payload[0].date,
        calory: action.payload[0].calory,
        protein: action.payload[0].protein,
        lipid: action.payload[0].lipid,
        carbonhydrates: action.payload[0].carbonhydrates,
        sugar: action.payload[0].suger,
        fiber: action.payload[0].fiber,
        scequiv: action.payload[0].scequiv,
        region: action.payload[0].region,
        allergy: action.payload[0].allergy,
        lastUpdated: Date.now()
      })
    case POST_PRODUCT_FAILURE:
      return ({
        status: "Failure",
        prodID: 0,
        prodName: "",
        description: "",
        price: 0,
        figURL: "",
        date: "",
        calory: 0,
        protein: 0,
        lipid: 0,
        carbonhydrates: 0,
        sugar: 0,
        fiber: 0,
        scequiv: 0,
        region: [],
        allergy: [],
        lastUpdated: Date.now()
      })
    default:
      return state
  }
}

export default postProductReducer;
